author.name: James Gilroy
author.description: Ecology, conservation, birdspotting

author.name: Emma Pattison
author.description: Feminist, Humanist and Green into gardening, good food, good books, random acts of kindness, mindfulness, equality and trying to maintain the equilibrium!

author.name: BiOME
author.description: Free online ecology magazine run by passionate ecologists, researchers, conservationists & nature lovers. info@biomeecology.com. Facebook: /BiOMEecology

author.name: Nárgila Moura
author.description: Birder, conservationist  and  adventure-lover

author.name: Sam Page
author.description: Green Campaigner: promoting rural development for sustainable food production and environmental protection

author.name: Simon Attwood
author.description: Researcher on #agroecology, #ecosystemservices, linkages between nature & culture. Plays the geetar and goes birding. Aspirant yoga practitioner. Views are own.

author.name: Alex Lees
author.description:
Birds, science, politics.
Lecturer in tropical ecology @ManMetUni, Lab associate @CornellBirds, views own.

author.name: J Hanlon
author.description: Birder, writer, photographer & freelance ecologist. Pro animal rights, anti-hunt, proud Eco-zealot. views my own unless RT'ing some fool's ramblings for a laugh

author.name: John C. Mittermeier
author.description: phd student at @oxfordgeography trying to get a handle on the cultural values that drive species conservation.  #ornithology, #conservation, #exploration

author.name: Jonas Geldmann
author.description: Postdoc in Conservation biology working on protected area effectiveness in reducing human pressure. Also interested in Environ. policy, Danish and international

author.name: Jessie Salter
author.description: evolution, birds, natural history, museums, musings, etc. (PhD candidate @LSU_MNS | @OxyMLZ alumna)

author.name: Alex Lees
author.description:
Birds, science, politics.
Lecturer in tropical ecology @ManMetUni, Lab associate @CornellBirds, views own.

author.description: Nerdy play toys for those who like to learn
